lines.text: Harlan, you don't dare somebody to kill ya.
[about one of her many love affairs]
It's complicated. Sometimes complications are interesting.
You guys are the biggest fuck-ups in the history of dope dealing. That's a huge fuckin' statement.
Do you know that you're acting exactly like Malcolm?
Nothin'. It's just... kind of creepy.
Well, if I'm acting like Malcolm at all, you should be grateful.
Well, uh, yeh, Malcolm got himself killed.
